game.name: DCS: MAD Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The principle of deterrence founded on the notion that a nuclear attack by one superpower would be met with and overwhelming nuclear retaliation such as that both the attacker and the defender would be annihilated As a result, both sides are guaranteed to be annihilated.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The principle of deterrence founded on the notion that a nuclear attack by one superpower would be met with and overwhelming nuclear retaliation such as that both the attacker and the defender would be annihilated As a result, both sides are guaranteed to be annihilated.
